text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Then please explain why the U.S. is among the worst performing countries in coronavirus response? And don’t use excuses: we weren’t notified, we didn’t have tests...EVERYONE was notified in January by WHO, some acted, some didn’t, #70DaysLost by Trump! #Fact #TrumpFail
